I - GHOST Library

2. Basic Geometry

gstEdgeMesh element representing an edge of one or more polygonal faces with two gstVertex elements at it's end points (v1 and v2).
gstIncidentEdgeType of edge used by gstTriPoly.
gstLineImplements an infinite line passing through space.
gstLineBaseBase class for all types of lines passing through space (ie.
gstLineSegmentImplements an line segment in space defined by two endpoints, p1 and p2.
gstPlaneRepresents a geometric plane.
gstPointRepresents a point in 3D space (x, y, z).
gstPoint2DRepresents a point in 2D space (x, y).
gstQuaternionImplement quaternions (to represent rotations).
gstRayImplements a ray originating at p1 and directed along the vector v1.
gstVector3D vector class (x,y,z).
gstVertexMesh element representing a position in space with incident gstEdges directed into and out of the vertex.
operator*Multiply operator for quats.
operator<<
operator<<Declare STL routines used by GHOST to be exported symbols from the dll.
operator>>
matrixToQuaternion
multQuaternionsMultiply 2 and return result.
multQuaternionsMultiply 2 quats, put result in 3rd argument.
normalizeQuaternionNormalize a quat.
quaternionToMatrixConvert a quat to a 3x3 matrix.
scaleQuaternionScale quat by a scalar.
withinEpsilonCheck if two points are nearly the same.
withinEpsilonCheck if 2D points are nearly the same.
